subject: JUnit & NB: 1) swingui TestRunner integrated? 2) listing Testsuite?
msgSnippet: Hi, I have 2 questions related to JUnit within Netbeans 1) swingui TestRunner integrated? Is TestRunner dialog integrated in Netbeans? I mean that when a
messageBody:
Hi,

I have 2 questions related to JUnit within Netbeans

1) swingui TestRunner integrated?

Is TestRunner dialog integrated in Netbeans?
I mean that when a directory (with Testsuite in it)
when I type Crtl-Alt-L or right-click->Tools->JUnit->Run
the test run but in the output window. It's fine but
I prefer using the dialog TestRunner.
Is it possible to launch it directly from NB?

I have found the workaround but would appreciate a more
elegant solution:
mount the junit.jar
run junit.jat.junit.swinggui.TestRunner

2) listing Testsuite?

My second question is related to TestRunner only. Is there a
way to have in the Test Selector also the Test Suite and
not only the individual Test?

The workaround is to type the TestSuite name in the textfield
for Test class names.

In anycase both NB and JUnit are great, thanks to all the
contributors.

Best Regards,

Xavier.
